quest.name: A Daughter's Love
journal: Sayo stares at you with wide, hopeful eyes.
objectives: Obtain three red coral from the area around Shisui of the Violet Tides.
Deliver the three red coral to Sayo.

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: Um, missmister? MissMister? You are an adult, right? Mother tells me I am still too young to venture far from home, but there is something that I really, really need.

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: Lately, Mother has not been feeling well. I thought making her a hairpin might cheer her up, but I have no coral.

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: Please, please, please, will you bring me three of the prettiest, reddest coral you can find?

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: If you do not know where to search for them, you should ask Tosetsu. He will be able to tell you!

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: Certainly. I can tell you where the red coral grows, but first you must answer me this: why do you want to know?

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: You are gathering them for Sayo that she might make a hairpin for her mother?

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: In that case, the most vibrant fields are located near Shisui of the Violet Tides. The crystals at the Turquoise Trench purify all the surrounding waters, making the coral there the most beautiful in the five seas.

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: It is said that those of crimson hue protect the women who wear them from coming to any harm. Good luck, madamsir. I hope you manage to make that little girl's day.

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: The coral you seek can easily be found near Shisui of the Violet Tides.

dialogue.name: TOSETSU
dialogue.text: You found them? Fantastic! I am sure Sayo will be absolutely delighted.

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: Were you able to find my coral?

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: Oooh! Thank you! Thank you so much, missmister! These are the best and brightest ones I have ever seen! ...Oh, and I found out earlier that Mother actually was not sick. She is going to have a baby, and I am going to be a big sister!

dialogue.name: SAYO
dialogue.text: I am thinking instead to use these to make two hairpinsâ”€one for Mother and another for my new baby sister! These red coral are sure to keep them safe forever and ever.
